value::value (5 of 35 overloads)

Copy constructor.

Synopsis 
value(
    value const& other,
    storage_ptr sp);
Description

The value is constructed with a copy of the contents of other, using the specified memory resource.

Complexity

Linear in the size of other.

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee. Calls to memory_resource::allocate may throw.

Parameters

Name

Description

other

The value to copy.

sp

A pointer to the memory_resource to use. The container will acquire shared ownership of the memory resource.
